entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
